Detect & Block Struts Bug

Hi {Name},


Recently disclosed, the Struts vulnerability is being actively attacked in the wild, as hackers jump at the chance to hit high-profile targets by exploiting this critical bug.


Apache has issued an emergency security alert for the Struts bug, classifying it as high risk and warning of remote code execution (RCE) attacks, which can lead to complete system compromises. It is very easy for hackers to spot vulnerable systems, and Struts exploits are available to the public and quite easily carried out.


With hackers taking advantage of the Apache Struts vulnerability, aggressively attacking enterprises worldwide, Qualys can protect your organization from this critical bug, which is hard to detect and difficult to patch.


For more information read more in our latest blog post on the topic, and watch the on-demand webcast hosted by Qualys Product Management Directors Vikas Phonsa and Frank Catucci.
